name: Energize Colleges
description: The Energize Colleges program helps build a highly qualified energy and sustainability workforce through paid, hands-on internships and academic learning experiences. SEI partners with colleges and universities to provide opportunities for student sustainability career exploration, and resume and skills development.
fullDescription: The Energize Colleges program helps build a highly qualified energy and sustainability workforce through paid, hands-on internships and academic learning experiences. SEI partners with colleges and universities to provide opportunities for student sustainability career exploration, and resume and skills development.
whatTheyOffer: The Energize Colleges program helps build a highly qualified energy and sustainability workforce through paid, hands-on internships and academic learning experiences. SEI partners with colleges and universities to provide opportunities for student sustainability career exploration, and resume and skills development.
howToGetIt: SEI partners with colleges and universities - Students apply via their school
address: 100 Smith Ranch Road, San Rafael, CA, 94903
